title: No Gifting Icon?
body:
Hey Riot,
So i mystery gifted my brother yesterday and I never received the gifting icon for the lunar revel?

replies.body: I don't think the Lunar Revel was occurring at that time.
I was able to buy firecracker jinx tho :/
The Lunar Revel items went up for sale before the actual Lunar Revel.
That's not cool. I believed since the skins and new lunar revel wards and the lunar revel buyable year of the goat icon was also available, that then the gifting icon would become available aswell.

Your argument is strong, and generally makes sense. I'd give you the icon if I had the power, but alas, I don't. I'm basically trying to tell you what a red would be telling you if you asked them.

Of course which you can still try. [Make a support ticket about it](http://support.riotgames.com/) and see what they do about it.
Thanks for the sympathy Brasupial. And the advice. Have a good day, cheers.
Me too. I gifted a friend and she gifted me, and we've both not received our lunar revel year of the goat icons... What's the go?
